items.content_html: Crawlyx is an open-source command-line interface (CLI) based web crawler built using Node.js. It is designed to crawl websites and extract useful information like links, images, and text. It is lightweight, fast, and easy to use.

items.content_html: igrpweb is a integrated platform created and developed by NOSi, targeted at e-Govermment people, developers and system admins. Its core is extremely lightweight and based on simple concepts. This is a template for Eclipse, to make igrpweb-Java Web Applications
